column4: hi all, can you someone pls help me with fixing wireless on a brand new hp mini 110?
can you be a lil more specific?
- sure, I've just installed UNR, and my netbook is running Broadcom STA wireless - it can detect networks, but it doesn't connect for some reaso
- yeah I know! I haven't been able to find much about it online. Is this a common problem?
- Broadcom 4312 wireless with ubuntu netbook remix
Froglet - Nope, it's the HP Mini 110 - 1059tu
the netbook remix is irrelevant - the kernel is the same
- ah, I see. I was going to try the regular version and see if that would make any difference, but I guess not then.
- hey thanks, I'll check it out now.
want to do a few tests on the command line?
- sure thing, what do you want me to type?
wait a sec! that box has a pcmcia slot?
